Comment - Class in com.soprabanking.ips.models
Class representing a comment made by a User on a given Proposal.Specifies all the fields and relationships of Comment entity in the database.
Comment() - Constructor for class com.soprabanking.ips.models.Comment
Initializes a newly created Comment object so that it represents an empty comment.
CommentController - Class in com.soprabanking.ips.controllers
Comments Controller This is a controller class for comments to be seen on proposals.
CommentController() - Constructor for class com.soprabanking.ips.controllers.CommentController
 
CommentDAO - Class in com.soprabanking.ips.daos
This class is a Data Access Object Class for Comment shown on proposals.It has the following methods fetchAllComments method to fetch all the comments of a given proposal createComment method to save the comment deleteComment to delete a comment
CommentDAO() - Constructor for class com.soprabanking.ips.daos.CommentDAO
 
CommentRepository - Interface in com.soprabanking.ips.repositories
This is the Comment Repository interface which extends the JpaRepository.It accesses the Comment model
CommentService - Class in com.soprabanking.ips.services
Class representing Comment Service that is responsible for providing the business logic for servicing the requests for Creation,Deletion and Retrieval of Comment objects from the database ,received from the CommentController
CommentService() - Constructor for class com.soprabanking.ips.services.CommentService
 
createComment(Comment) - Method in class com.soprabanking.ips.daos.CommentDAO
This method will create a comment and save it using the save method.
createTimer(UUID) - Method in class com.soprabanking.ips.services.TimerService
This method creates the timer.
createToken(UUID, String) - Method in class com.soprabanking.ips.services.TokenService
This method sends the reset link to the registered email id.
createUpvote(Upvotes) - Method in class com.soprabanking.ips.daos.UpvotesDAO
This method is used to create an upvote on a proposal
CustomUserDetails - Class in com.soprabanking.ips.config
Custom User Details This class implements userDetails interface of spring boot security.
